column5: Own private entrance/exit through enclosed porch. Have access to porch/sitting area, own bedroom restroom and ample closet space.   No access to main house or kitchen   SmallFridge & microwave, cable TV, no wifi  Queen size restroom/shower.   Lockbox, easy entrance.  Cats lives in house, they do not go into space
column8: Private entrance -2.2 miles N of DT
